scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack. The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on the model's predictions, circumventing data access controls.
initial_goal: Determine which customers are most likely to churn in the next quarter, based on the churn prediction model's output.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking - Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system
